name: After School
storyline: In this game you play as the main character as they return to school at the end of the day to pick up some forgotten items. Compared to the atmosphere the school has during the day, the evening brings on a very scary feeling. You will get to walk around in the school as you search for you items, all the while being haunted by a creepy feeling. If you manage to avoid the terrors coming your way, and gather all your forgotten items and get back to your bike to get home, you will clear the game. It might not be so easy as it sounds, though...
summary: In this game you will get to enjoy an old, wooden school building in present-day Japan, which is a location you don't get to see as often these days.
